title: N 叉树的前序遍历 (N-ary Tree Preorder Traversal)
content: 思路:递归法 // @Title: N 叉树的前序遍历 (N-ary Tree Preorder Traversal) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-10 11:43:36 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 42.5 MB // @comment: 递归法 // @flag: BLUE /* // Definition for a Node. class Node { public int val; public List<Node> children; public Node() {} public Node(int _val) { val = _val; } public Node(int _val, List<Node> _children) { val = _val; children = _children; } }; */ class Solution { public List<Integer> preorder(Node root) { List<Integer> result=new ArrayList(); if(root==null){ return result; } result.add(root.val); if(!root.children.isEmpty()){ for(Node temp:root.children){ result.addAll(preorder(temp)); } } return result; } }
